title: Cox Sports Report - 10/19 Episode
text: Cox Sports Report - 10/19 Episode Special to VirginiaPreps.com Special to VirginiaPreps.com Related Links: Talk about it in V. I. P. - 'MEMBERS ONLY' CLUB In its eighth season, the Cox Sports Report showcases detailed highlights of High School Football games from across the Tidewater area weekly and has now expanded its reach to include action from Roanoke and Northern Virginia as well. Hosted by Matthew Hatfield and Andy Mashaw , the nationally syndicated show can be seen in homes around Virginia every Monday evening at 6:00 and 11:00 PM EST with encore presentations throughout the week. Select highlights and interviews are also available on Cox on Demand and on the Cox 11 YouTube Channel here . Check out the October 19th show below . . . Lafayette 41, Poquoson 19 (0:37) Grassfield 38, King's Fork 14 (4:40) Northside 10, William Byrd 7 (9:10) Oscar Smith 23, Western Branch 21 (14:40) Hampton 19, Phoebus 7 (19:58) Additional Scores/Player of the Week (24:00)
